name: Evergreen Laurel Hotel

reviews.text: No-frills hotel. Nicely appointed rooms. Lobby is lackluster but you get a nice surprise when you get to the room. Good service but no frills. Very good for business travellers due to location on North Sathorn road.
reviews.title: Great Business Hotel
Great value and location for business
reviews.text: I read the reviews about this hotel, and they are accurate. Good quality, Chinese hospitaility and close to transport. If I had know that the Lumpini station and Suan Lum night bazaar were so close, I would have spent more time there.
Good internet, great service, nice food and very well suited to business travellers who aren't looking for 5 star.
reviews.title: Delightful boutique hotel with first class staff and service
Value for Money
reviews.text: For the price, its worth it..
location is very apt for biz trips and prices are very reasonable.
reviews.title: Very Taiwanese

reviews.text: Clean good hotel, average buffet. Did not try th eother restaurants. large clean bathrooms. Also provided baby cot. were also helpful, when we wanted to leave some luggae behind to go visit some of the other islands.
reviews.title: Good hotel

reviews.text: A good central location as well.
reviews.title: Wonderful Hotel in Good Business Location

likes.liked: — Friendly staff, spacious rooms, free internet, complimentary water

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed at the Evergreen Laurel while on a 2 week business trip to Bangkok. It was chosen by my company because of the close location to our Bangkok office.
reviews.title: My favorite in Bangkok

reviews.text: The hotel is wonderful, and everything about my stay was good. The rooms are spacious (especially the bathroom), the staff is always very helpful and pleasant, and the breakfast buffet is quite large. There is free wired internet connections in the rooms with wireless in the common areas. Complimentary bottled water is furnished every day in the rooms..a nice touch.
reviews.title: Great hotel.

description: The Evergreen Laurel Hotel, Bangkok, is a 5-star hotel, located on Sathorn Road, in the heart of Bangkok's fastest growing business district, amid bustling commercial offices, banks and embassies. Close by is the bustling Silom area, a burgeoning center for shopping and entertainment.
